title: Sampler, 1818
medium:
Medium: silk and wool embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross stitches on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Donor's Note: "Bought in Portsmouth, N.H. 1908."
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Several bands of alphabets and numerals, separated by narrow cross borders, and at the bottom the inscription.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1818.
1818. Medium: silk and wool embroidery on linen foundation
